coreAttributes.name: House of El Cape
coreAttributes.description: A cape made of a mysterious highly resilient material which provides the wearer with immense resistance to any form of physical damage.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(drape)] the cape over [npc.her] shoulders, before fastening the strap around [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(drape)] the cape over [npc2.namePos] shoulders, before fastening the strap around [npc2.her] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(drape)] the cape over [npc2.namePos] shoulders, before firmly fastening the strap around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the strap around [npc.her] neck, before taking off [npc.her] cape.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the strap around [npc2.namePos] neck, before taking off [npc2.her] cape.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the strap around [npc2.namePos] neck, before pulling off [npc2.her] cape.
